EmailTemplate.description: Email template for Prospects attended for FMF
EmailTemplate.name: FMF_Prospects Attended_1
EmailTemplate.subject: Great to see you {!Lead.FirstName}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for visiting BehrPro at the 2013 Federación Mexicana de Fútbol Asociación event in Phoenix. Please call your local Home Depot Store (www.behrpro.com/storelocator) so we can tell you more about BEHR® and KILZ® products or professional services.
Discover how Behr can help you build your business
Learn about BEHR® and KILZ® products Free delivery to your job site* Save money with volume pricing Learn about Behr's factory tinting Learn about Behr's nationwide reach
*Where available
Go to www.behrpro.com/bpservices to learn more about our service offering.
Sincerely, {!Zip_Code_Assignment__c.Behr_InStore_Rep__c} Behr InStore Rep {!Zip_Code_Assignment__c.Behr_InStore_Rep_Email__c}
You have opted-in to receive email newsletters from BehrPro. If you no longer wish to receive promotional notifications and news, please send us an email at unsubscribe@pronews.behrpro.com
If this email has been forwarded to you and you wish to subscribe, please send us an email at subscribe@pronews.behrpro.com
To read our Privacy Policy go to www.behrpro.com/privacypolicy
We recently updated our Privacy Policy. If you wish to change your preferences, please follow the directions in the Privacy Policy.
